name: For the King (itch) (Sateklon)
description:
In Spain 1493 Diego Marttinez is chosen to fight the hordes of demons that conquered the mighty kingdom. Equipped with his holy sword, will he defeat the hordes and complete his quest ?

This Action-Platformer places you in the shoes of this mighty warrior. Crush your enemys with your sword and protect yourself with your shield.

But be careful the world of For the King is defiled with these 3 types of Demons :

Kill these demons and keep your eyes open for more Skulls and holy shrines, there you can convert your collected skulls to faith, wich brings you to the next level.

Movement :

Move : A&D or Left Stick

Attack : E or RB

Block : Q or LB

Installguide :

Download -> unpack the folder in your desired place -> start the exe "For the King" -> have fun

Thanks for playing :) 

Still work in Progress
